Warden of Vitality

Level 3 Evocation Spell

While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus action to heal yourself or nearby allies.

Warden of Vitality is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Warden of Vitality is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
